thread.section_title: Hotel Saint Charles - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice place
thread.title_full: Nice place - Review of Hotel Saint Charles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: RJH48
title: Nice place
text:
Friendly reception staff, comfortable beds. The room we were in was a bit on the small side - two single beds with just enough room to walk around them to get to the bathroom. Bathroom wasn't perfectly clean, few marks here and there, but not too noticable and otherwise nice. Good value for money.
Roughly 20 minutes walk to the seine and nearest Batobus station (near the Jardon du plantes) and about 5 or 10 minute walk from the nearest metro station.
Decent selection of places to eat within walking distance.
